name: sprocket
text: I would very much like to see that banjo animated as part of a Svankmajer short.

name: empy
text: It'd be covered in lichen and each string would be dragging a lump of meat as it crawled.

name: bpmead
text: I can't believe anyone has ever said something so wonderful.

name: audry
text: i'd say dali... then ants start coming out of it

name: karljw
text: chubbied every single comment.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Love Svankmajer shorts! They come in all sizes!

name: jmocken
text: One should not welch on a pretty please the way Pat does here.

name: saint
text: pat does what he should not and does not do what he should.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Yet, he gets what's coming.

name: saddestking
text: A comment left by saddestking was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by theoddwaffle, Cyberbob, kenthegod, Scorpio_nadir, St-Elmos_Fire, Pigs)

name: sp1derbaby
text: Shuddup or oi'll paddyslap ya!

name: saint
text:
I think it is rad for you to SHUT THE FUCK UP.

I'm sorry. I should not have yelled.

name: zem
text:
did you just call out a use of "welsh" as being offensive and then turn around and make fun of people who do that

i don't know why i'm asking, you obviously did, but i mean why did you post that

name: tripperday
text: Watching Pat get damaged is like watching the happy ending of every movie with a villain.

name: whuppins
text: Pat getting injured: Always funny.

name: love_is_so_punk
text:
I always like seeing vegans get hurt.

(as long as it's not like real serious or anything... their bones snap hell of easy, and they're still my friends after all)

name: direhaggis
text: Gadzooks, it's like John Carpenter becoming either suddenly clever or insane.

name: gigs
text: You say that as if the two are mutually exclusive.

name: tombsgrave
text: I am muchly reminded of "Naked Lunch."

name: tellumo
text: Téodor gave Pat THE HOSE! And he richly deserved it.

text: Damn! No pienso que ese vay a comencer!

text: NO HABLO ESPAÑOL

text: what a total dick.  fuck you, pat.

text: Hopefully Ray's Satanic banjo will drag Pat to hell.

name: taiiga
text: roast beef has stiff legs

name: howl
text: No kidding, although I don't know if it would even be possible for a real-life cat to do this. (I have not messed around with a cat in some time.)

name: gompo
text: When is the banjo broken?  NOW it is broken.

name: shutup_shutup
text: That capitalization is so perfect, it almost hurts me.

name: gage
text: Broken banjo.  We're lookin' at a six hundo.

name: overmedicated
text: OFF TOPIC: Where in the name of Christ's China Cups did you get your avatar.

text:
Notice that your avatar is frikkin' awesome

where'd you get it

text: (it's from star trek)

text: Stardate 3211. Fuck-You-Friday yet again.

text: Hey, dude, that's a pretty cool avatar. Where did you find it?

name: jdhenry105
text: I like watching Roast Beef get comfy.

name: charchar
text: He knows the argument could go on a while.

name: nonanon
text: Seriously, somebody get that cat a bucket of popcorn.

text: I honestly didn't see that coming. Compared to the last 4 or so strips.

name: cailetshadow
text: The last frame would make a very good "Happy Holidays from Achewood!" snapshot.

name: agentj
text: When someone has been an asshole forever and you see them being hassled by someone legit you take a seat and enjoy. Make a day of it.

hey pat! fuck you!

put that in your pipe and smoke it!

text: I cannot imagine Philippe saying this. It disturbs me.

text: "Yeeeeks! Oh no!" strikes me as a pretty timid reaction to being grabbed by an ambulant banjo.

text: They are cats, why does Pat have to wear shoes?
